headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json"

parameters.name: auth_code
parameters.description: The authorization code for the Spark Ads post.

parameters.name: original_post_auth_code
parameters.description: If this post is a duet or stitch from another post or it mentions another video, you also need to get the authorization code for the original post. Use this field to specify the authorization code for the original post. Note: Currently, the post can only mention at most one video.
